cause.description:
Briana Richine is really concerned about global warming. The purpose of this group is to show her that we support her crusade. After all she is the golden child of her family.
1. Sweet little Briana knows that global warming must stop.
2. She doesn't care if global warming means hotter ocean temps.
3. Briana gets what she wants. And she wants to stop global warming.
cause.name: Help Briana Stop Global Warming
